title: Pool Party Rek' Sai Recall not working
body:
When i recall with pool party rek sai, it does not finish and puts me back in burrow mode.
Riot pls, fix dis bug

replies.body: Just found out the problem, the wi-fi. Apparently, when my bro plays the ipad, the recall fails, but when he doesn't, it works just fine
Yeah I have posted a thread about this but no one actually bothered to check lol.When I recall instead of eating the frog in the pad it goes back to burrow mode.
